task.title: Create a Prose.io Response Post
task.shortdesc: These steps will show you how to create a text file using Prose.io and saving it to the GitHub class repository.

step.cmd: Login to prose.io and authenticate with github account.
Click "new file" and rename file using format: "LastName-FirstInitial-Wk#".
Click "save" and "commit" to publish post to Github.
